item.description: As usual we will be eating, drinking, and trying new dishes together as a group, with plenty of conversation and laughs to go around. As always please bring cash to pay for food at the end so we don't have to spread the bill over credit cards! Thanks and I look forward to seeing everyone again and meeting our new members in September.

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: The Middle of CT Sushi September Meetup
